price: Nyagasani w’Uburasirazuba n’Uburengerazuba; nta yindi mana ikwiye gusengwa itari We. Bityo, mugire umurinzi (wawe).
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-mashriqi wal-maghribi lā ilāha illā huwa fa-ittakhidh'hu wakīlan
